sentence: Second, in July, House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy decided to pull all Republican members he had nominated for the House committee investigating January 6, following House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's rejection of the presence of GOP Reps. Jim Jordan of Ohio and Jim Banks of Indiana on the panel.
author: Chris Cillizza
title: The massive miscalculation Republicans made on the 1/6 committee

sentence: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi last year vetoed putting Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, and Rep. Jim Banks, R-Ind., on the panel, so House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy pulled his three other GOP picks, leaving Pelosi free to tap Kinzinger and Cheney.
title: RNC censure of Kinzinger, Cheney could backfire for Illinois Republicans

sentence: Ron DeSantis, Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas), Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) and Republican attorneys general who want to launch an investigation into GoFundMe for its police-requested action against a foreign protest organization.
author: Mary Papenfuss
title: Christian Fundraiser For Kyle Rittenhouse Now Collecting Millions For Ottawa Trucker Mob

sentence: The members include longtime allies to former President Donald Trump Reps. Jim Jordan of Ohio, Jim Banks of Indiana, Rodney Davis of Illinois, Kelly Armstrong of North Dakota, and Troy Nehls of Texas.
title: A Jan. 6 shadow committee sets its sights on U.S. Capitol Police

sentence: In July, Pelosi objected to two of McCarthy's appointments to the panel—Representatives Jim Jordan of Ohio and Jim Banks of Indiana.
author: Xander Landen
title: Raskin Says 1/6 Committee 'Able to Get Work Done' Thanks to McCarthy Gamble

sentence: “Do you think it was a mistake for [House Republican Minority Leader] Kevin McCarthy to remove all of the Republicans on the January 6 committee once [Speaker Nancy] Pelosi took off [Illinois Representative] Jim Banks and [Ohio Representative] Jim Jordan?” Mr Wong asked.
author: Gustaf Kilander
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene defends Jan 6 because it ‘only happened one time’ as she berates journalist on video
